title: Resuscitatio, or, Bringing into publick light severall pieces of the works, civil, historical, philosophical, & theological, hitherto sleeping, of the Right Honourable Francis Bacon, Baron of Verulam, Viscount Saint Alban according to the best corrected coppies : together with His Lordships life / by William Rawley ...
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed Sarah Griffin, for William Lee, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet ...,
